Translations.Text: Se abasyambhabi ghatana
ki se abasyambhabi ghatana
ara kise apanake janabe se abasyambhabi ghatana ki
samuda o ‘ada sampradaya mithyaropa karechila bhitiprada mahabipada samparke
Atahpara samuda sampradaya, taderake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pralayankara biparyayakari pracanda citkara dbara
ara ‘ada sampradaya, taderake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pracanda thanda jhanjhabayu dbara
ya tini tadera upara prabahita karechilena satarata o atadina biramahinabhabe; takhana apani ukta sampradayake dekhatena--- tara sekhane lutiye pare ache sarasun'ya khejura kandera n'yaya
Atahpara tadera ka'uke'o apani bidyamana dekhate pana ki
ara phira‘a'una, tara purbabartira ebam ultiye deya janapada papacare lipta chila
Atahpara tara tadera rabera rasulake aman'ya karechila, phale tini taderake pakara'o karalena --- kathora pakara'o
Yakhana jalocchbasa hayechila niscaya takhana amara tomaderake arohana kariyechilama nauyane
amara eta karechilama tomadera siksara jan'ya ebam ejan'ye ye, yate srutidhara kana eta sanraksana kare
Atahpara yakhana singaya [1] phumka deya habe ---ekati matra phumka
ara parbatamala saha prthibi utksipta habe ebam matra eka dhakkaya tara curna-bicurna haye yabe
Phale sedina sanghatita habe mahaghatana
ara asamana bidirna haye yabe phale sedina ta durbala-biksipta haye parabe
Ara pherestagana asamanera pranta dese thakabe ebam sedina atajana phirista apanara rabera ‘arasake dharana karabe tadera upare
Sedina upasthita kara habe tomaderake ebam tomadera kono gopana'i ara gopana thakabe na
Takhana yake tara ‘amalanama tara dana hate deya habe, se balabe, ‘la'o, amara ‘amalanama pare dekha
‘ami drrhabisbasa karatama ye, amake amara hisebera sam'mukhina hate habe.’
Kaje'i se yapana karabe santosajanaka jibana
su'ucca jannate
yara phalarasi abanamita thakabe nagalera madhye
Bala habe, ‘panahara kara trptira sathe, tomara atita dine ya karechile tara binimaye.’
Kintu yara ‘amalanama tara bama hate deya habe, se balabe, ‘haya! Amake yadi deya'i na hata amara ‘amalanama
ara ami yadi na janatama amara hiseba
‘haya! Amara mrtyu'i yadi amara sesa hata
‘amara dhana-sampada amara kono kaje'i asala na
‘Amara ksamata'o binasta hayeche.’
Pheresataderake bala habe, ‘dhara take, tara galaya beri pariye da'o
‘Tarapara tomara take jahanname prabesa kariye dagdha kara
‘Tarapara take srnkhalita kara emana eka sekale yara dairghya habe sattara hata’
niscaya se mahana allahara prati imanadara chila na
ara misakinake annadane utsahita karata na
ata'eba, e dina tara kono suhrda thakabe na
ara kono khadya thakabe na ksata nihsrta sraba chara
ya aparadhi chara ke'u khabe na
Ata'eba, ami kasama karachi tara, ya tomara dekhate pa'o
ebam ya tomara dekhate pa'ona tara'o
niscaya e kura'ana eka sam'manita rasulera (bahita) bani
Ara eta kono kabira katha naya; tomara khuba alpa'i imana posana kare thaka
eta kono ganakera katha'o naya, tomara alpa'i upadesa grahana kara
Eta srstikulera rabera kacha theke nayilakrta
Tini yadi amadera name kono katha racana kare calate cesta karatena
tabe abasya'i amara take pakara'o karatama dana hata diye
tarapara abasya'i amara kete ditama tara hrdapindera sira
atahpara tomadera madhye emana ke'u'i ne'i, ye tamke raksa karate pare
Ara e kura'ana muttakidera jan'ya abasya'i eka upadesa
Ara amara abasya'i jani ye, tomadera madhye mithya aropakari rayeche
Ara e kura'ana niscaya'i kaphiradera anusocanara karana habe
ara niscaya eta suniscita satya
Ata'eba, apani apanara mahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna
